org.bonitasoft.engine.bpm.flownode

Interface ActivityDefinition

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseElement, BonitaObject, DescriptionElement, FlowNodeDefinition, NamedElement, Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AutomaticTaskDefinition, CallActivityDefinition, HumanTaskDefinition, ManualTaskDefinition, ReceiveTaskDefinition, SendTaskDefinition, SubProcessDefinition, TaskDefinition, UserTaskDefinition
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActivityDefinitionImpl, AutomaticTaskDefinitionImpl, CallActivityDefinitionImpl, HumanTaskDefinitionImpl, ManualTaskDefinitionImpl, ReceiveTaskDefinitionImpl, SendTaskDefinitionImpl, SubProcessDefinitionImpl, TaskDefinitionImpl, UserTaskDefinitionImpl

    public interface ActivityDefinition
extends FlowNodeDefinition
    An Activity is work that is performed within a Business Process. An Activity can be atomic or non-atomic (compound). The types of Activities that are a part of a Process are: Task, Sub-Process, and Call Activity, which allows the inclusion of re-usable Tasks and Processes.
    Author:
    Baptiste Mesta, Feng Hui, Matthieu Chaffotte
